Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20698 affecting package clamav for versions less than 0.104.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-20698 affecting package clamav for versions less than 0.104.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package clamav is earlier than 0.104.2-1, affected by CVE-2022-20698
